title.en: Chara Otoko-san to Koi ni Nante Ochinai!

altTitles.ja: チャラ男さんと恋になんて落ちない!

description.en: [Batoto Scans] 'I can't believe I'm doing such a thing with someone I just met today...' Hinako, who was recently dumped by her boyfriend, went on a trip to get over her heartbreak and met a tanned flirtatious man on the way. "I'm going to comfort you," he said. Hinako had somehow caught his interest, and he made her heart melt with his remarkable techniques?! The flirtatious man doesn't have a rival at the beach this summer! There's no way she can resist him!!!
